en.meta_title: Bros24 ‚Äî Whiteout Survival Discord Bot | All-in-One
en.meta_desc: One bot. All applications. Events, Boosts, Heroes, Calculators & more ‚Äî built by players for players.
en.meta_keywords: Bros24, Whiteout Survival, Discord Bot, Event Center, Boost, Hero, Calculator, Ranking, Welcome, State 214, DOA, guide, wos bot, bros24bot
en.hero_text: Stop stacking extra Discord bots. The Bros24 Whiteout Survival bot unites Events, Boosts, Heroes, Calculators, Welcome & Ranking in one multilingual assistant ‚Äî built by players for players.
en.hero_badge: By players, for players ‚Äî Whiteout Survival
en.usp1_text: Event Center, Boost tracking, Hero Hub, Calculators, Welcome & Ranking ‚Äî everything in one bot.
en.usp2_text: Less setup, less clutter. One clean, modern menu flow for everyone.
en.usp3_text: You shape the bot with your requests. Community feedback ships weekly.
en.features_sub: Everything your alliance needs ‚Äî in one place.
en.feature_event_text: Create reminders (title, message, images, thumbnails, custom footer). Schedules: daily / 48h / weekly / bi-weekly / every 4 weeks / custom. Target channels, @everyone, roles or members. Edit & delete via menu.
en.feature_hero_text: Hero details, skills, tier lists, building strategies and advanced mechanics.
en.feature_calc_text: Furnace & resource planning, chief gear & charm math, island guide, ranking & welcome, plus minigames.
en.coming_text: New features for Bros24 are on the way ‚Äî crafted for alliances, smarter coordination and more fun in Whiteout Survival. Got ideas? Tell us!
en.upcoming_b1: üì£ Event Office 2.0 ‚Äî smarter reminders (UTC), weekly cycles, fewer duplicates
en.upcoming_b2: üß≠ Labyrinth Helper ‚Äî zone schedule + recommended troop mixes
en.upcoming_b5: üìä Alliance Tools ‚Äî invites planner, transfer tracker, NAP quick lookup
en.cmd_boost_text: Track boosts, set goals, view leaderboards.
en.menu_update_b1: Hub for Boost, Events, Languages, Hero Info, Chief, Calculator, Island, Welcome, Ranking, Games.
en.menu_update_b2: Multilingual (EN, DE, FR, IT, PL, TH).
en.event_update_text: Create events with titles, messages, images, thumbnails, and custom footers. Schedule daily, every 48h, weekly, bi-weekly, every 4 weeks, or custom intervals. Target channels, @everyone, roles, or members. Edit & delete via menu.
en.lang_update_b1: Language switch fixed: remembers your choice and updates dates dynamically (Europe/Warsaw).
en.topgg_text: Vote for the bot, add it to your server, and discover our Whiteout Survival State 214 community.
en.support_highlight_text: Bros24 stays free for everyone. If you‚Äôd like to help with server costs & weekly development, you can support via Frost Stars in Whiteout Survival ‚Äî totally optional, no pressure.
en.community_title: Join the ‚ùÑ Whiteout Survival | DOA 214 Community
en.community_sub: Events, guides, alliance tools & more ‚Äî be part of it.
en.community_p1: Do you play Whiteout Survival and want to get better‚Äîfaster? Ever wondered how top states plan Bear Trap, Frostfire Mine, or squeeze every drop from SVS? You‚Äôre in the right place.
en.community_p2: We‚Äôre DOA‚Äôs community from State 214, open to every state and alliance. Join for teamwork, practical guides, and quick help ‚Äî from beginners to min-max pros.
en.community_p3: New to the game? We‚Äôll guide your first weeks: what to build, research pacing, which heroes & pets to focus, daily routines, and best F2P value.
en.community_p4: Experienced? Dive into meta chats, comps, damage math, sheets, and high-level planning for Castle/Strongholds, Frost Dragon Tyrant, and cross-state play.
en.community_p5: Never miss rewards: custom bots run smart timers, rally planners, and reminders ‚Äî organized, not spammy.
en.community_p6: Effortless communication with language channels for each community. Post in your language and get help fast.
en.community_p7: Leaders & creators welcome. Share strategies, coordinate cross-state projects, recruit respectfully, and keep it fair-play.
en.community_p8: Jump in, say hello in #arrival, tell us your state & language, and we‚Äôll unlock the right channels. If you like it, please ‚≠ê vote on top.gg!

it.meta_title: Bros24 ‚Äî Whiteout Survival Discord Bot | All-in-One
it.meta_desc: Un bot. Tutte le applicazioni. Eventi, Boost, Eroi, Calcolatori & altro ‚Äî creato dai giocatori per i giocatori.

it.hero_badge: Da giocatori, per giocatori ‚Äî Whiteout Survival
it.usp1_text: Event Center, tracciamento Boost, Hero Hub, Calcolatori, Benvenuto e Ranking ‚Äî tutto in un bot.
it.usp2_text: Meno configurazione, meno caos. Un flusso di menu chiaro e moderno.
it.usp3_text: Modellate il bot con le vostre richieste. Aggiornamenti settimanali guidati dalla community.
it.features_sub: Tutto ci√≤ di cui ha bisogno la tua alleanza ‚Äî in un solo posto.
it.feature_event_text: Crea promemoria (titolo, messaggio, immagini, miniature, footer personalizzato). Pianificazioni: giornaliere / 48h / settimanali / bisettimanali / ogni 4 settimane / personalizzate. Canali, @everyone, ruoli o membri. Modifica ed elimina dal menu.
it.feature_boost_b3: Menu pubblico persistente ‚Ä¢ resistente ai riavvii
it.feature_hero_text: Dettagli eroi, abilit√†, tier list, strategie edifici e meccaniche avanzate.
it.feature_calc_text: Pianificazione fonderia e risorse, gear & charm del Chief, guida all‚Äôisola, ranking & benvenuto, pi√π minigiochi.
it.coming_text: Nuove funzionalit√† per Bros24 stanno arrivando ‚Äî pensate per le alleanze, una coordinazione pi√π smart e pi√π divertimento in Whiteout Survival. Hai idee? Dicci tutto!
it.upcoming_b1: üì£ Event Office 2.0 ‚Äî promemoria pi√π smart (UTC), cicli settimanali, meno duplicati
it.upcoming_b2: üß≠ Labyrinth Helper ‚Äî pianificazione zone + team consigliati
it.upcoming_b4: üåç Menu multilingue (EN/DE/PL/FR/IT/TH) ‚Äî auto-detect e default per server
it.upcoming_b5: üìä Strumenti alleanza ‚Äî planner inviti, tracker trasferimenti, lookup rapido NAP
it.cmd_menu_text: Centro principale di tutte le funzioni.
it.cmd_event_text: Crea e gestisci promemorie e pianificazioni.
it.cmd_boost_text: Traccia boost, imposta obiettivi, vedi classifiche.
it.cmd_hero_text: Dettagli eroe, statistiche, abilit√† e tier.
it.cmd_ranking_text: XP, classifiche e card di rango.
it.menu_update_b1: Hub per Boost, Events, Languages, Hero Info, Chief, Calculator, Island, Welcome, Ranking, Games.
it.menu_update_b2: Multilingue (EN, DE, FR, IT, PL, TH).
it.event_update_text: Crea eventi con titoli, messaggi, immagini, miniature e footer personalizzati. Pianifica giornalmente, ogni 48h, settimanalmente, bisettimanalmente, ogni 4 settimane o personalizzato. Target canali, @everyone, ruoli o membri. Modifica ed elimina dal menu.
it.lang_update_b1: Fix al cambio lingua: ricorda la scelta e aggiorna le date (Europa/Warsaw).
it.topgg_text: Vota il bot, aggiungilo al tuo server e scopri la nostra community Whiteout Survival State 214.
it.support_highlight_text: Bros24 resta gratuito per tutti. Se vuoi aiutare con i costi del server e lo sviluppo settimanale, puoi sostenerci con Frost Stars in Whiteout Survival ‚Äî del tutto opzionale.
it.community_sub: Eventi, guide, strumenti di alleanza ‚Äî unisciti!
it.community_p1: Giochi a Whiteout Survival e vuoi migliorare pi√π in fretta? Ti chiedi come i top state pianificano Bear Trap, Frostfire Mine o SVS? Sei nel posto giusto.
it.community_p2: Siamo la community DOA dello State 214, aperta a tutti gli stati e alleanze. Teamwork, guide pratiche e aiuto rapido ‚Äî dai principianti ai min-max.
it.community_p3: Nuovo nel gioco? Ti guidiamo nelle prime settimane: cosa costruire, ritmo delle ricerche, eroi/pet su cui puntare, routine giornaliere e valore F2P.
it.community_p4: Gi√† esperto? Meta, composizioni, matematica del danno, fogli e planning avanzato per Castle/Strongholds, Frost Dragon Tyrant e cross-state.
it.community_p5: Mai pi√π ricompense perse: bot personalizzati con timer, planner rally e promemoria ‚Äî senza spam.
it.community_p6: Comunicazione facile con canali linguistici. Scrivi nella tua lingua ‚Äî l‚Äôaiuto arriva veloce.
it.community_p7: Leader e creator benvenuti. Condividi strategie, coordina progetti cross-state, recluta con rispetto.
it.community_p8: Entra, saluta in #arrival, indica stato e lingua. Se ti piace, ‚≠ê vota su top.gg!
